text: No Way Out (2007) was a professional wrestling pay-per-view show made by World Wrestling Entertainment (WWE). It took place on February 18, 2007 at the Staples Center in Los Angeles, California. It was the ninth No Way Out event held by WWE. Although the event was announced to be exclusive to the SmackDown! brand, ECW's World Champion Bobby Lashley defended his title against Mr. Kennedy, while Raw's World Tag Team Champions John Cena and Shawn Michaels also competed in the main event. No Way Out was WWE's last single- branded PPV until Backlash (2016). ==Matches== No. Results Stipulations Times 1 Rob Van Dam defeated Shelton Benjamin Singles match 5:02 2 Chris Benoit and The Hardys (Matt and Jeff Hardy) defeated Montel Vontavious Porter and MNM (Joey Mercury and Johnny Nitro) (with Melina) by submission Six-man tag team match 14:19 3 Chavo Guerrero defeated Scotty 2 Hotty, Daivari, Gregory Helms (c), Funaki, Shannon Moore, Jimmy Wang Yang, and Jamie Noble Cruiserweight Open for the WWE Cruiserweight Championship 14:11 4 Finlay and Little Bastard defeated The Boogeyman and Little Boogeyman Mixed tag team match 6:44 5 Kane defeated King Booker (with Queen Sharmell) Singles match 12:38 6 Paul London and Brian Kendrick (c) defeated Deuce 'n Domino (with Cherry) Tag team match for the WWE Tag Team Championship 8:07 7 Mr. Kennedy defeated Bobby Lashley (c) by disqualification Singles match for the ECW World Championship 15:27 8 Ashley Massaro defeated Jillian Hall, Kelly Kelly, Layla and Brooke Adams Diva Talent Invitational 9:40 9 John Cena and Shawn Michaels defeated Batista and The Undertaker) Tag team match 22:09 (c) –is the champion(s) going into the match D – This match was a dark match ===Cruiserweight Open eliminations=== Elimination no.
